articles.title: China exempts Nexperia chips from export controls - BBC
articles.description: The block on exports of the company's chips had raised fears that European car production would be hit.
articles.content:
Nick Edser,Business reporter and 
Peter Hoskins,Business reporter
China has lifted export controls on computer chips vital to car production, the country's commerce ministry said on Sunday.
Exempt… [+3056 chars]
